   (a) Guidance and Counselingcombined with a science 
teaching subject Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, 
Biology or Integrated Science.  
(b) Guidance and Counselingcombined with a Social 
Science Teaching subject; Social Studies, Economics, 
Geography, and Political Science.  
(c) Guidance and Counselingcombination with an Arts 
Teaching subject; English Language, French, Music, 
Igbo Linguistics, Histo ry, Religious Studies, Fine and 
Applied Arts.  
(vii) ILORIN accepts ‘O’ level pass in Mathematics for 
students who combine Guidance and Counseling with 
subjects other than Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry, 
Biology and Economics.  
(viii) EKSU accepts NCE merit in relevant subjects.  
(ix) DELSU accepts NCE merit or 'A' level passes in any 
two(2) subjects at one (1) sitting.  
(x) IAUED – Same as in Education and Management.  
(xi) BSU requires NCE passes in relevant subjects with 'O’ 
level credit passes/TC II merit in three (3) other 
subjects and Guidance and Counseling, ‘O’ levelcredit 
pass in Mathematics or lower credit in relevant ND 
programme from any recognised institution of higher 
learning provided the UTME requirements are met.  
(xii) NDU – Same as Vocational and Technical Education.  
  
  
UTME  
(i) EDALV - No admission through the UTME.  
(ii) ABUJA, EBSU, TASUED and LAGOS require 'O' level 
credit passes in two (2) Arts/Science subjects in 
addition to English Language and Mathematics.  
(iii) DELSU requires'O' level credit pass in Mathematics and 
'O' level pass in Biology/Health Sciences  
(iv) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of Literature 
in English, History, Government, French, Geography,
